companyDescription: The Public Bank Group’s banking business includes the provision of a comprehensive suite of financial products and services, which comprises personal banking, commercial banking, Islamic banking, investment banking, share broking, trustee services, nominee services, sale and management of unit trust funds as well as bancassurance and general insurance products.
